name: Renovated, Sleeps 6, BU, BC, MBTA
summary: Second floor of renovated ,2 bedroom condominium. Hardwood floors,central air, high ceilings, In unit laundry, bay windows, recessed lighting with dimmers, spacious living area great for gatherings offers 4K smart TV.  Quiet tree-lined street, steps to restaurants,shops, reservoir,3 different Green Line trains, reservoir.Very easy access downtown, Boston College, Boston University,Copley Square, Boston Commons, Prudential Center, Quincy Market, and more. Pets considered. Comfortably sleeps 6.
space: Inviting open floor plan features brand new kitchen with cherry cabinets, stainless appliances, and granite counter-tops features breakfast bar and seating. Bedrooms offer queen sized bed, sectional in living room pulls out to a sleeper. Brand new tiled bath with glass shower. Great unit for family gatherings and get together's. Enjoy summers evenings sitting outside on front porch.

name: Spacious Room in Brookline - Free Laundry
summary: This building is located in Packards Corner in Brookline, to the east of Boston proper. It is an area favored by young professionals, particularly those working in medicine or education. With the MBTA close by, this is a great place to live if you want easy access to the city.  NOTE: This unit is professionally managed by Bedly, a furnished housing provider. Bedding, pillows, towels, & toiletries are NOT provided, so please plan accordingly.
space: This room is a part of Bedly, a furnished housing community. This space is professionally managed and the Bedly customer support team is available 7 days a week from 9am to 9pm. You will receive full contact information when your reservation is accepted. This is a co-living space and other Bedly residents currently live in other rooms in this unit. -Free Cleaning (2x Monthly) -Utilities Included -High-Speed WiFi -Customer Support Team All Bedly guests must complete and clear a background check online (free of charge) after their reservation is accepted. We will also collect your contact information so that we can keep you updated about important information regarding your Bedly living space.

name: Brookline/ Boston BEST Location BC, Longwood Med
summary: An urban oasis, light filled, and tastefully decorated bedroom. Room includes queen size bed, microwave, mini fridge, loveseat, Amazon dot ( Alexa ), WiFi, etc  This is a lovely bedroom inside a 3 bedroom, 2 bath condo directly on Beacon St in beautiful, safe Brookline.  You will have use of bathroom directly outside bedroom door. I may use it occasionally, but it will be mainly for your use. I have 2 middle school children that are away at camp during summer. They have their own space/bathroom.
space: I include complimentary snacks, and drinks in fridge. You will feel most welcome. However,  we will stay out of your way and space. I do have a super cute Yorkie that is around house, invite him in or shut him out. Your space is yours.
description: An urban oasis, light filled, and tastefully decorated bedroom. Room includes queen size bed, microwave, mini fridge, loveseat, Amazon dot ( Alexa ), WiFi, etc  This is a lovely bedroom inside a 3 bedroom, 2 bath condo directly on Beacon St in beautiful, safe Brookline.  You will have use of bathroom directly outside bedroom door. I may use it occasionally, but it will be mainly for your use. I have 2 middle school children that are away at camp during summer. They have their own space/bathroom. I include complimentary snacks, and drinks in fridge. You will feel most welcome. However,  we will stay out of your way and space. I do have a super cute Yorkie that is around house, invite him in or shut him out. Your space is yours. You are free to use kitchen, living room, dining room as well. There is a washer/dryer in my kitchen as well. My availability differs greatly. I may be traveling and you may be only one in house, or I may be here, or my 2 kids may be present, or may not. I am alw
neighborhood_overview: BC is around corner, We are in the heart of Cleveland Circle on Beacon St in Brookline. Washington Square is a quick walk. The T is literally steps out our front door. Beautiful tree lined Beacon St. Park one block away. Chestnut hill Reservoir 5 min walk away. Many restaurants, CVS, 7-11, bar(s), grocery store all either across street or short walk away.  BC very close, great place for commuting to Longwood Medical Area, Boston hospitals,  etc
notes: Our condo is in an older brick building. My home could use a fresh coat of paint, and some upgrades, however not possible at this time. It is very clean and loved as it is for now ;-)
transit: Literally the C line and D line are so close. The T is out our front door. Cleveland Circle down 1 block. No car needed. Boston Common is a quick hop on T and 15 min ride away. BC walking distance.
access: You are free to use kitchen, living room, dining room as well. There is a washer/dryer in my kitchen as well.
interaction: My availability differs greatly. I may be traveling and you may be only one in house, or I may be here, or my 2 kids may be present, or may not. I am always available by phone for calls/texts to answer any questions. The summers are filled w/camps and traveling so most likely quieter time than school year.
host_about: Fun free spirited mom of 3 awesome kids ;) I live in Brookline Ma with my 2 boys. I love life and adventures !

name: Dexter Park 2b1.5b independent room
summary: 仅限于女生租住｡房间家具齐全,包括桌子,转椅,沙发,床头柜,衣柜,衣架子等等｡居住舒适｡ 房间位于七层,隐私性极好,采光很棒｡ 另外,希望租客离开时可以物归原位,谢谢!

name: Modern 2 BR apartment
summary: Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment located in Brookline. It's a 5 minutes walk to the BU campus. There are supermarkets, pharmacies, target, restaurants and the green line within a 5-minute walk.
space: Beautiful and comfortable 2-bedroom apartment with a newly renovated kitchen. High-speed wifi is available for guests as well as a flat tv with netflix and apple tv.
description: Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment located in Brookline. It's a 5 minutes walk to the BU campus. There are supermarkets, pharmacies, target, restaurants and the green line within a 5-minute walk. Beautiful and comfortable 2-bedroom apartment with a newly renovated kitchen. High-speed wifi is available for guests as well as a flat tv with netflix and apple tv. Self-check-in yourself during your stay. The host will be always available through phone/message/email throughout the stay. Harvard street, Beacon street and Commonwealth Ave are just down the street! These streets are filled with things to do, restaurants, local bakeries, stores and a lot more!
neighborhood_overview: Harvard street, Beacon street and Commonwealth Ave are just down the street! These streets are filled with things to do, restaurants, local bakeries, stores and a lot more!
interaction: Self-check-in yourself during your stay. The host will be always available through phone/message/email throughout the stay.

name: Spacious one-bedroom apt in Brookline brownstone
summary: Seeking courteous guests to my home while I am away traveling! Whimsically-decorated, spacious (900 sq. ft), light-filled one-bedroom apartment with full bed on upper (3rd) floor of gorgeous Brookline brownstone. Equipped with big-screen Roku TV and full kitchen / dining set. Located steps from Green C Line T train stop and Cleveland Circle (restaurants, shops). Grocery store a 5 min train ride away. I'll be away, so you can check in when convenient for you with a lock box set of keys
space: This is my primary residence but I travel frequently for work / pleasure, so I wanted to set up my place to be able to accommodate Airbnb guests while I am away. I have my clothing, food, etc. packed away in the dresser and closets so you have your own space Bedroom is spacious and an interesting round shape--window shades allow you to get as much or little light as you'd like. Full kitchen and dining set at your disposal (I have a dishwasher too) Coin-operated washer / dryer in basement ($2 each)
description: Seeking courteous guests to my home while I am away traveling! neighborhood_overview: 2 min walk from Cleveland cricle, filled with restaurants / dining (Chipotle, pizza, pub food, etc.), coffee shops (Dunkin, Starbucks), convenience store / pharmacy (CVS), hardware store, Supercuts, etc.; 25 - 45 minute T ride into downtown Boston (Back Bay, Park Street, etc.) depending on time of day; <10 minute walk to gorgeous Boston College reservoir--great for casual strolls, jogs, and runs!
notes: Parking in dedicated numbered off-street parking spot available for $35/day
transit: Boston's version of the subway, called the T, has two stations located within a 2 min walk of the apartment right on the street outside the front door.
interaction: You can call or text me on my cell during your stay--I will likely be out of state, but I can provide you with guidance (e.g., hidden spare key) should you run into issues
